history.content:
It is! It's not cheap, but it could work for you. Make sure you read the enrollment policies; Concurrent Enrollment students are only enrolled after UCB students so you have to wait sometimes up until the add/drop deadline to be enrolled. You might have a better idea of our most impacted grad classes and can strategize. 

http://extension.berkeley.edu/static/studentservices/concurrent/

children.subject: If you do not need the official grade, you might be able to sit in on the class, particularly if you will be associated with the university in some way.

history.content: Is it possible for me to take a couple classes next semester, if I graduate this semester? Specifically 1 or 2 grad classes, since I'll be in Berkeley, but really don't want to have to pay a full semester of out-of-state tuition...
history.subject: Take classes after graduating
